session_info.name: FRXPLS - Invited Oral: Beam Dynamics and EM Fields

papers.title: Symplectic Period Three Implies Chaos
authors: This invited talk describes a new concept of nonlinear dynamics that expands the classic work of Li and Yorke "Period Three Implies Chaos" to certain categories of symplectic maps. The theoretical classification of this type of chaos in accelerator systems may lead to the development of new control and feedback methods as seen similarly in fluid dynamics
and advance to experimental investigation at the Integrable Optics Test Accelerator at Fermilab.
in "Nonlinear Dynamics and Chaos: Advances and Perspectives. Understanding Complex Systems". Springer
